summary: AN ORDINANCE amending the 2009 Adopted Budget, including the 2009-2014 Capital Improvement Program (CIP); changing appropriations to various departments and budget control levels, and from various funds in the Budget; creating a new Budget Control Level; adding a new project and revising project allocations for certain projects in the 2009-2014 CIP; making cash transfers between funds; and ratifying and confirming certain prior acts, all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
